title: Refund Policy
data: We appreciate your purchase at Mehta Placements
Refunds are not provided for non-tangible, irrevocable goods ('digital products') once the order is confirmed and the product is delivered.
Please note that our refund policy does not apply after the course has commenced.
Should you encounter any difficulties in receiving or downloading our products, we encourage you to reach out for assistance.
For any issues, please contact us at: Mehtavoice12@gmail.com
